scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && DOCKER_HOST='ssh://docker' NODE_ENV=production docker compose -f docker/compose.yaml -f docker/compose-prod.yaml up -d --build
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=dev docker compose -f compose.yaml -f compose-dev.yaml up -d --build
scripts.local-prod: NODE_ENV=production docker compose -f compose.yaml -f compose-prod.yaml up -d --build
